39473210.review:
A basic fit the shapes in to a grid puzzle. While those games tend to be quite dull and frustrating to me, this gives you clues in the form of music you build up to a complete tune. 

Its a polished and satisfying little puzzler. Not very long, but its fun while it lasts and I suspect Ill be back to complete it again and listen to the arrangements of the snippets of classic songs.

Id recommend it with one caveat, Id keep it on your wishlist until a sale. Its pricey considering its length and difficulty.

간단하게 시간때우기 딱좋습니다.

38772216.review: いろんな曲がある、パズル要素ありで楽しく遊べました！

38742154.review:

不正解でも、これはこれで良いんじゃない？と思う音がままあります。

38348901.review: Quite an interesting idea for a game. Some of the puzzles can be somewhat tricky.

38314956.review:
[h1]명곡들과 함께 가볍게 즐기기 좋은 음악 퍼즐[/h1]

일반 모드에서 화면에 숨겨진 악보 조각들을 찾아 완성하고
퍼즐 모드에서는 악보 틀에 맞게 테트리스 블록처럼 생긴
연주 블록을 순서대로 배치하여 곡을 완성시키는
숨은 그림 찾기 + 블록 퍼즐 게임입니다.

음악을 듣고 곡을 완성시키는 퍼즐이라 어려울 것 같지만
게임에 사용된 곡들이 전부 유명한 곡이라 친숙한데다가
잘 모르는 음악이라 할지라도 악보 틀이나 블록 모양,
무늬 등으로 때려 맞추면(…) 생각보다 쉽게 완성할 수 있습니다.

사실 그런 만큼 퍼즐을 완성했을 때의 달성감은
생각보다 약하지만 대신 익숙했던 그 곡들이 퍼즐로 완성되서
웅장하게 연주되는 걸 듣는 건 상당히 감동적입니다.

게임 자체의 불륨이 적은 게 다소 아쉽지만 잠깐 쉬어 가며
힐링하는 느낌으로 즐기기엔 참으로 좋은 게임입니다.

38289019.review: Very nice when the bear doesn't step on your ear like mine.

37970643.review:
もの探し+旋律合成パズル！

部屋の中にあるミュージックボックスの設計図を集めることと、
見本のメロディーを参考にパートごとに別れたメロディーのピースをうまく組み合わせてみんなが知っている音楽のアレンジ版を完成させることがこのゲームの目的。
よく聞いたり調べると、元の楽曲はみんなが知っているであろう物が多いので、英語が読めなくてもそんなに苦にはなりません！
ただ、中には「ピアノのメロディーだけど、２つのパートに分かれてる」ものや、「見本のメロディーが聞けないもの」など難易度もある程度わかれています。
でもピースをクリックして経過を聞いてアレンジが完成してゆく感じはナイス！
全体的には簡単な部類と思いますので、「音楽のアレンジを聞きたい！」そんな人におすすめです。

37659625.review:
тихая, милая, спокойная, предсказуемая (когда проходишь много-много-много-много раз)
хороший подбор композиций
жаль, что очень короткая 
<3

37195354.review: Excelente jogo, com um visual ótimo, gráficos adequados e, claro, músicas que estão presentes na vida de todos e em todos os lugares do mundo. Quebra-cabeças bem elaborados e divertidos, excelente para qualquer um.

37133115.review:
As puzzle games go, this isn't anything special. The game has aged reasonably well, but you won't find anything here that you haven't seen before if you're even a little familiar with the genre. 

But the title isn't Musaic Box for nothing, and it really is the music that makes this game happen. Some of the pieces you will now, some you (probably) won't. All are arranged prettily enough that you may enjoy them on repeat before you move on to the next puzzle to tinker with. 

All in all this ain't no revolutionary game, but fun for a rainy afternoon.

36884236.review: Ein kurzer Puzzlespiel mit einfachem Spielmechanismus. Man sucht sich seine Musikstücke zusammen und muss diese dann zusammensetzen. Je nach Vorgabe varriert die Herangehensweise etwas. Vertreten sind dabei kurze Ausstücke aus klassischen Stücken als auch aus Kinderliedern. Für kleinen Spaß und schöner Musik zwischendurch durchaus geeignet.

36083705.review: 퍼즐을 조합해서 음악을 듣는게 좋아요. 숨은그림찾기는 아무데나 클릭하다보면 나오는 류라 딱히 할말이 없네요. 올클리어하면 퍼즐을 취향대로 조합해서 음악을 들을 수 있어요.

34453131.review:
숨겨진 노트를 찾는 것이 가장 어려웠다. 
블록을 하나하나 맞추고 난 후 full song이 나올 때의 가슴벅참이 있다. 
참소리 박물관에 가서 뮤직박스의 소리를 직접 들었는데 매우 흡사하다. 아주 사실적인 게임이다.

34302259.review:
[url=http://www.gamer.ru/everything/fp-musaic-box-3]Обзор Musaic Box (от 27 сентября 2013)[/url]

Прочитав название этого, вышедшего уже вечность назад, проекта, любой даже самую малость эрудированный геймер легко догадается о двух главных составляющих игры – речь пойдёт о музыке и головоломках.

Сюжет же игры не даёт нам никаких особенных откровений, мягко намекая, что дедушка главного героя был эксцентричным сумасшедшим гением, спрятавший в собственном доме множество музыкальных фрагментов, которые, будучи собраны воедино, могут быть проиграны на специальных музыкальных машинериях, среди нашего народа более известных как «шарманки» или «катаринки». Хотя, конечно, я вас обманываю. Музыкальная шкатулка всегда остаётся музыкальной шкатулкой.

Эксцентричный предок обладал обширными интересами в области музыки, поэтому находить чертежи для проигрывателя будет не так просто, как может показаться. [b]Kranx Productions[/b] постарались и сделали из самого унылого игрового жанра «поиск предметов на локации» одно из самых интересных путешествий по миру классической (и не только) музыки.

Собирать величайшие музыкальные шедевры буквально по частям очень занимательно. Игра покажется интересной даже тем, кто напрочь лишён слуха, ведь головоломки можно решать не только слушая, как они звучат, но и с помощью обычной логики. Неожиданно многогранная игра, не правда ли?

Как вы уже догадались, цель каждой головоломки в том, чтобы известная мелодия заиграла без ошибок и фальши. Для этого можно прослушивать как отдельные фрагменты, так и получающуюся мелодию целиком. Кусочки различаются по цвету, и каждый цвет обозначает свой музыкальный инструмент. Проще всего собрать костяк мелодии по одному инструменту, постепенно вбрасывая в звуковую круговерть всё новые и новые кусочки.

В этом может помочь такой, например, факт, что одинаковые цвета нельзя располагать в одной колонке, что очень даже логично – ни один виртуоз в мире не сможет впихнуть в "музыку" сразу два звука одного инструмента единовременно. Игрок также имеет бесконечную возможность совершать ошибки – игра за это не карает. Именно поэтому, кстати, в конце игры она кажется столь же легкой, что и в начале.

Все собранные мелодии хранятся в специальной книге, и вы всегда сможете вернуться к прослушиванию или проигрыванию любой пройденной загадки. Каждая запись на страницах книги сопровождается кратким описанием впечатлений главного героя об этой мелодии, а иногда и воспоминаний.

На айпаде ли вы пройдёте эту замечательную игру или купите в стиме, решите загадки сами или с помощью простейших геометрических знаний… не важно. Главное, чтобы вы ознакомились с этой игрой, ведь она не только интересная, но и познавательная. И не важно, что в ней всего несколько часов игры, ведь гораздо приятней осознавать тот факт, что ты знаешь каждую из этих мелодий — что-то слышал на уроках музыки, что-то в телевизоре, а кое-что когда-то сам пел на сцене. Приятно, мать её растак!

28814848.review: Fun game of you can find it online. It's free as a flash game but is incomplete. I bought it on steam hoping to play it but no matter what I do it wouldn't load visually for my computer. I can hear the sounds playing, but that is about it. No need to buy this game.

28522121.review:
This is a short game (a little less than 2 hours) that basically asks you solve very easy Sodoku puzzles to recreate classic music pieces. If you have an ear for music it's a great little thing to complete. The puzzles aren't all unlocked in the beginning, however; to find them, you need to search for them in a point-and-click game. I didn't find the point-and-click aspect of it interesting, but the music part was great fun in my opinion.

There is a mode at the end that allows you to mix-and-match components of songs together to create your own puzzle, but who's really got time for that?

There is not really any replayability, but hey I got this game for nearly free so I'm not complaining, since I enjoyed my time.

27519423.review: It's a fun little puzzle game. The song selection is pretty good (mostly classic ones that people probably can remember). The puzzles were great, although it took a bit of time to find everything. I'd give it 8/10.

26294722.review: 엄청 재밌게 했어요. 퍼즐이랑 클래식음악을 좋아하신다면 추천! DLC가 나왔음 좋겠습니다.

26213628.review:
偶然在库里发现这个小游戏，玩了一会发现还挺好玩的。大致是说某天你爷爷喊你到他的屋子里然后就玩消失，然后你开始乱翻爷爷的东西的故事。其实就是一个解密+拼图的游戏。拼图是拼音乐片段，有些有样板，按照样板把音乐串起来再按照拼图规则加入其他乐器混音。解密则是在寻找一些碎片，碎片合成一个完整纸片就可以开始拼图了。
    曲子都是些耳熟能详的老曲子，不过加上些混音听起来非常带感。对音乐不熟悉的朋友直接拼图其实也能玩，加上有随便用的提示，听听曲子也是美滋滋。
    至于缺点，一个就是拼图玩法太单一，一直到最后两三个个图才有一个新玩法出现，当然一共也没十几个图。。。再一个就是解谜寻物没有什么逻辑，有时候看到记号了可以找一下，大部分时间都在瞎点，不过好在有个提示还剩几个没找到，不然真是要疯。。。
    总之，单冲着音乐，还是一个不错的休闲小游戏的。

[u]评分：7/10[/u]

25692625.review: игра понравилась,прошел за 2,5 часа и не жалею потраченного времени.

25502916.review: I love this game, it's a bit short, but you can have a lot of fun rearanging the songs and creating something new.

24783683.review: I wish this game was more replayable, needs more levels or DLC.

24545207.review:
Beat the game in 2.8 hours.  Zero replay value at all.

Played the "demo" on Armor Games, purchased it on Steam to get the other two rooms - which were no more or less difficult, challenging or exciting than the first three.

Complete disappointment.

The game is good... just.. not worth the $8 I paid for it.  At all.  There is absolutely nothing to do once it has been beaten - no replay value, no "randomized" new quests, nothing.  Just an editor mode that really does nothing at all, with no way to share or publish new puzzles from said editor, and the editor itself is restricted to what parts of an individual piece of music are available - there is only so much "arranging" you can do with such a limited number of pieces and space to place them.

24145156.review: I have mixed feelings about this review.  I do generally like these types of puzzles.  The game would benefit from a little less hand holding, a bit more difficulty in the hunt and click portion, and a few other minor issues.  The biggest thing for me however, is the programmers' apparent lack of familiarity with instrumentation.  The synth music they use is super cheesy, and clashes harshly with the antique music box feel they are trying to go for visually.  They really skimped on the number of instruments portrayed visually in the puzzle section.  They use the trombonist for virtually all the wind instrument parts.  Meh, it could be refined a lot, and using real instrument samples would make it much classier.

23947048.review:
The concept is good but the execution is atrocious.

The tutorial holds your hand with a deathgrip, instructing you what to click on and where, and doesn't even allow you to click away the tutorial pop ups -- those just float there, forever, the entire rest of the game interface disabled, until they are obeyed.  The game manages to maintain the same feel well into gameplay, which I found startling and impressive.  The two primary types of gameplay seem to be solving music puzzles (described below), and find-the-object search-and-click.  Whenever you've found enough objects to unlock a puzzle, the interface will "helpfully" switch screens for you, and you are going to be solving that puzzle whether you want to or not.  There are no settings in the options menu to control this behavior.  

I like casual games, but this game manages to make casual painful.  Interrupting the player's train of thought and forcing them to shift from one style of gameplay to another is a recipe for tension, not relaxation, and it has no place in a game this slow-paced.

Railroading and pacing/transition issues aside... The puzzles remind me of a cross between simplified base 4 sudoku and tetrad-based fill-in-the-shape puzzles.  You get tetrads built out of different colored pieces, each piece having a portion of the melody on it, and being color-coded to match a particular instrument.  You want there to be one block of each color in each column, and you want the parts of the melody to go in the correct order, and you need to arrange the tetrads to do that while fitting in the given shape.  It ends up being very simple, but it COULD be fulfilling and interesting -- if the game would let go of my damn hand and let me do anything on my own.

All in all, I would primarily recommend this game to ten year olds, people who have never played with either puzzles or games before, and recovering stroke victims.  I suspect that most other gamers will find the structure to be chafing, rather than a helpful source of direction.

23892272.review: I'm still playing and if you like classical music, this game is for you

23721875.review:
I was originally put off by the puzzles' squiggly lines, but as soon as I hit the tutorial I was having a lot of fun playing around with the music. The game showcases plenty of familiar songs and keeps it simple. You don't need to be an expert to put the notes together, or even know how the song goes. Both the music and the puzzles have a good amount of variety, I didn't find either to be repetitive at all.

I think the least appealing part of this game would be the sections in which you look for scraps of paper in various rooms, but the game gives enough hints for it to be reasonably easy. 

Very laidback lil' game with very beautiful bits of music, I just wish it was a lot longer.

23647061.review:
游戏流程是在房间里搜集藏起来的乐谱，收集到一首曲子完整的乐谱之后，在音乐盒里将碎片正确地拼出完整的乐曲。
身为音乐家的爷爷，房间里有许多音乐家的相片及乐器等，鼠标移上去会有相应的介绍或是乐器的声音，整个游戏玩下来也是学习了一些小知识~ 找不到的时候会有闪光提示，没耐性的孩子不会因为找不到而烦躁。有些乐谱要在一些机关之后才会出现，挺有趣的。
在每个房间的Musaic Box上用方块拼出乐曲这个部分是本游戏的核心，也是我觉得最好的地方！基本上就是依照主旋律将音乐片段摆在正确的地方。这个过程主要是靠听，这一点非常新颖！不同的谜题考验的能力也不同，有时也有不给出主旋律的谜题，这时就要凭音乐片段上的图案、谜题的结构等来解题。图像与音乐结合，能让孩子直观地认识音乐。
总的来说，只是一款寓教于乐的小游戏。里面的曲子都是小星星、魂断蓝桥等耳熟能详又经典的曲目。小缺点是流程有些短，一共只有5个房间可以探索。我小时候怎么就没有这么好的音乐启蒙游戏呢~

23568423.review:

I can't find anything to complain about so I suppose that's a good thing. Personally, I was a fan of the music pieces and would really like to have seen more.

这款游戏有一个很严重的缺点 
而且这个缺点让人无法忍受

[spoiler] 流程太短[/spoiler]

22162143.review:
游戏的主要内容是找拼图，找全了拼图就顺便拼一下，拼完了之后还能得到其他拼图……
（主要是这找的过程是在是太麻烦了）
……

Musaic Box是一款结合了音乐与拼图的游戏

拼图中每个方块上的颜色代表一种乐器（每个方块上面的点与线代表了旋律的音高走势）

目的就是把所有拼图拼上去，保证音乐听着不别扭，且每列没有颜色相同的小方块

拼图不难，有点音乐的感觉就行

音乐都是些很耳熟的调调（估计这也是这款游戏好评的主要来源）

22013423.review:
A really nice game ! 
The game combines very well puzzles with classical music .

Its a bit short tho so i recommend getting it from someplace cheap if you can .

21944890.review: Very ingenious puzzle musical game. Very enjoyable, even for me who don't have a good musical ear. Highly recommended. :)

21944398.review:
クリアしました。
ボリュームは多くはないですが、音をカギにしてブロックはめ込みをするというアイディアはよく、なかなか楽しめました。
楽曲はほとんどが誰でも聞いたことがある古典音楽です（例、蛍の光、誕生日の歌）
クリア後に選べるクリエイションモードというのが一応ありますが、個人的にはあまり価値を感じません。

検索すると無料ゲームとして存在するようですね、比較していませんので楽曲が増えているのかどうか等不明です。
steam版の楽曲数は27曲です。

6/10

21199736.review: 은근히 재밌어요. 조각 찾을때 한 두 조각이 잘 안나와서 답답할때가 있긴한데 하면서 재미있게 했네요.

20754441.review:
Сюжет нестандартного сочетания музыкальной головоломки и детективного квеста, которым является Музаик, предлагает игрокам разрешить загадку пропажи старого органного мастера. Справляясь с разнообразными задачами и постепенно собирая необходимые сведения, вы будете находить чертежи музыкальных шкатулок, открывающих главную прелесть Музаика – фирменные пазлы, в которых необходимо собирать мелодии шедевров классической и современной музыки из нескольких маленьких кусочков. В отличии о других головоломок, в Музаике вам поможет не столько логика, сколько слух. Правильно собранная мелодия приблизит к разгадке тайны, раскрыв которую, вы разблокируете специальный режим свободного творчества, позволяющий самостоятельно создавать музыкальные композиции и аранжировки к ним. 
Музаик – теперь и ты можешь стать композитором!

20332795.review: This is a genius idea made into an exceptionally enjoyable game. Tetris-like blocks contain bits of a musical score and are colored according to what instrument you'll hear when clicked upon. Fit them all together in the correct way to play famous songs. Out of all of them, there were only two I didn't know by heart. But even if you don't recognize a single one, a bar on the bottom of the screen will play the whole tune for you, as many times as you like. The catch is, you'll only hear each score from ONE instrument. That instrument normally plays the main tune so it's usually not too difficult to figure out what order those blocks go in. But then you have to place all the other instruments and make sure the blocks fit together correctly. For those who love both puzzles and music, Musaic Box is a real gem. My only gripe is that the game isn't long enough. I could have happily played for many more hours.

20278270.review:
Simple, Short, Cheap.

A couple hours of entertainment for a couple dollars.

20273153.review:
Very nice little puzzle game that will test your wit as well as your ears. The idea is to assemble all the puzzle pieces to recreate famous classical songs.

What's good:
1. Very simplistic, but satisfying and unique puzzles with reasonable difficulty curve.
2. The music is good (duh). I just wish they recreated the songs in their full lenght and allowed you to listen to it after succefully solving a puzzle.
3. There is some variety in the puzzles to spice up the gameplay.

What's not so good:
1. Very short.
2. You can play most of the game for free online. Not that much new content.
3. Sadly literally no replay value. Having the ability to create custom puzzles with additional songs would help.

Overall, I'm not sure if this game is worth the full price. But when it goes on sale, pick it up, you'll have good time.

20133752.review:
An inventive and unique little puzzle game. 

In this game you find pieces of paper, in the style you would in a hidden object game, and you use those pieces to unlock new music, therefore new levels, for you to play. 
The levels consist of famous songs, you’re given a preview to listen to and must reconstruct the music with the blocks you are given.

It was fun having a puzzle game that relied mostly on sound. I say mostly because not only did you have to sus out which notes go where from listening to the preview, but you have to think logically about how to make the Tetris style blocks fit into the outline you are given and them still be in the right order. 

The music is fun, it takes classic and well known songs and adds instruments into the background. Some sound really odd, seeing as you end up with something like Mozart with drums and a little tambourine going off in the background, but it’s still fun and inventive.  

The game is a little short, but it’s unique and I like the more unique kind of puzzle games. 

If you enjoy music (especially classical) or puzzle games in general, I think this one is a good way to kill a few hours. It took me 8 hours to complete it entirely, but admittedly I did get stuck a few times and wondered away from my PC a few times. A normal human being probably wouldn’t take as long. 

All in all, I like it. It’s not the best puzzle game I have ever played, but it’s not the worst either. Not by a long shot. 


TL;DR : A fun puzzle game based around music. Mostly classical stuff, with a modern twist of instruments added into the back for depth. It’s a little short, but worth a try in my opinion.

20058449.review:
5/5 Stars
WARNING: DO NOT BUY THIS GAME IF YOU ARE LEGITIMATELY TONE DEAF or have no speakers/headphones on your computer. This game requires the ability to hear tone/pitch.

What an incredible treat - a fun and clever puzzle game that teaches and enlightens the gamer about music. I can't recommend this game enough. A good price at $4, a steal for anything less. I would recommend this for any age of gamer.

Pros: Intuitive interface, easily learned. Finding the pieces to begin a puzzle is easy as clicking around the screen. Solving the puzzles is a little more challenging and requires an ear for audio. A good hint function is available during puzzles that gives you clues so you can figure out where you're wrong.

Cons: The hint function is only for the phase where you solve a puzzle. It doesn't help your find the puzzle pieces in a room. Short game play - it took me all of two hours to complete all the puzzles and there is no replayability.

19959602.review: Nice short puzzle game with an aspect of item search. I would recomend to buy it on sale tho.

19586367.review: The full version of a free demo. It's very good when you finish the puzzle and hear the music.

19368745.review: Un juego de puzles sencillo que dura como mínimo 2h para pasar el rato cuando estas aburrido. Si te conoces parte de las melodias los puzles se pueden resolver mucho mas rapidamente. Ademas cuando lo completas te permite mezclar todas las canciones del juego a tu gusto.

18798802.review: I really enjoyed this game. It was quiet easy though, I enjoyed the different classical music is used.

17742307.review:
A nice little puzzle game quite as long as it needed to be and not bad for the price. 
Part hidden object game, part puzzler. 
It will certainly kill a few hours and the arrangements are very pleasant. 
A nice little surprise I found in a Humble Bundle.

17421012.review: A cute little game. Great music, not too long either. Only complaint would be when  I can't find certain music sheets, so I have to wait for the hint to show up. Not a long wait, but modeately annoying. Other than that its a great little game.

17397415.review:
Je me suis retrouvée avec ce jeu un peu par hasard et je me suis dit que peut-être il serais intéressant mais je me suis rapidement trompée voila pourquoi :

- Il est trop court : Oui j'ai terminer ce jeu en un peu plus d'une heure, j'avais afk entre-temps et je regrette ces quelques centimes dépenser dans ce jeu. Je me sens arnaquée.

- Il est trop simple : Le jeu vous fait croire que vous allez avoir besoin d'écouter de nombreuses fois chaques morceaux afin de réussir le puzzle, ce qui n'est pas le cas. Une fois le rythme compris vous pourrez juste vous contentez de placée les pièces aléatoirement dans le puzzle puisque le jeu lui-même vous dit quelles pièces ne sont pas au bonne endroit.

- Il n'y a pas d'histoire : On te met un scénario qui te laisse présagez une fin pouvant être poétique ou poignante mais non on te donne une bref introduction, tu fais tes puzzles et... c'est tout pas d'histoire plus que ça. Je sais pas moi le grand-père pourrais être mort ou gravement malade ou je-ne-sais-pas et la boîte à musique renferme un message d'adieu, un précieux souvenir, QUELQUE CHOSE pas juste "The End" à ce moment la tu ne met même pas de scénario.

- Les musiques : Pas grand chose à redire c'est du classique, la base en somme... bien que j'aurais volontiers massacrée la trompette pour avoir un volume trop élevé par rapport aux autres instruments.

Au final je me suis plus ennuyer qu'autre chose mais si tu as vraiment, mais alors vraiment rien de plus intéressant à acheter pourquoi pas ? Il est pas méchant ce jeu s'il avait été sur téléphone ça aurait été un peu plus intéressant dû à sa très courte durée de vie il ne sert à rien d'autre qu'à passer le temps.

17349768.review:

16824136.review: Музыкальные пазлы. Просто интересная игрушка. Сказать более нечего.

16739243.review:
Even though I had some issues with the game saves, I still recommend this game. The graphics are beautiful, and the music is an excellent arrangement of classical with a kind of contemporary dance/electronica beat to it.
 The game involves using both auditory and visiual senses to solve the song puzzles. My favorite part is the "Creation" option. You can arrange the music pieces of the songs to make your own song/arrangement.

16722977.review: Musaic Box is a really nice puzzle game. The puzzles are challenging and I really like the idea of using music in these kind of games. Me and my sis both played it, we loved it, the only negative aspect is it's short. I wish there were more games like this. Definitely recommended

16404016.review:
Приятная, но слишком короткая игра, проходящеяся за пару часов. Игропрцесс состоит из классического "найди-вещи-в-бардаке" и забавного пазла, где мы должны заполнить поле специальными фигурами, которые, в свою очередь состоят из кусочков музыки. Выставив все фигуры правильно мы получим целый отрезок музыки, и доступ к следущей головоломке. Игра радует скорее эмоциями типа "о! я знаю этот мотив!" нежели чем-то другим, что и даёт ощущение, что игра неплохая, т.к. на такой волне проходится почти каждое игровое поле. Плюс в карму разработчикам за аудио состовляющие, слушать десятки раз одно и тоже, пока решаешь пазл не заставляет уши кровоточить, и это хорошо.
Игру рекомендую, но не за 100р это точно.

15833789.review:
A nice mix of "puzzle" and "hidden-objects" genres that will introduce you to some of the classical music while also putting a modern spin on it. It's short but competent at what it does, and the concept while nothing groundbreaking is still kinda neat.


*note: Make sure to not Alt-Tab or otherwise minimize the game when in fullscreen mode as it may cause your game to crash without saving your progress.

15694882.review: Extremely short and really easy. Gameplay trades between pixel-hunting that's shockingly annoying for how simple it is and rearranging pieces of (badly-rendered) midi versions of public-domain songs. Not worth playing.

15037582.review: Шикарная музыка, хороший поиск предметов - отличная игра. Вполне подойдёт, чтобы провести несколько вечеров наедине с классической музыкой.

15024030.review: Picked it up on sale, good way to waste some time, very casual. Where's Waldo? meets a musical puzzle game. Very short, but an enjoyable experience none the less.

14496876.review: Очень мнего хороших композиций. Мне нравиться.

14277734.review:
Na początek powiem tylko, że wciągneła mnie bardziej niż The Walking Dead...

Ogólnie ta gra to mieszanka point and clicków z łamigówkami. Zbiera się w niej kartki, a później gdy zbierze siękomplet z danego utworu, odbywa się najciekawsza część gry. Łączy się kostki w melodie, co wcale nie jest takie trudne, jak się wydaje. Graficznie mi się spodobała, ale nie oczekujcie niczego wspaniałego. Jest cholernie wciągająca, ale trwa niestety tylko z dwie godziny. Potem pozostaje tylkk coś co przypomina edytor (nie wiem jak to nazwać, bo nie jest to ani edytor, ani endless mode).

Gra może siępodobać wszystkim - i małym, i dużym. Polecam w nią zagrać z młodszym rodzeństwem lub dziećmi, żeby wprowadzić je w podstawy klasyki. Można się spodziewać "Ody do radości", "Dla Elizy" i "XL Symfonii" Mozarta.

Grę naprawdę polecam, biorąc pod uwagęw walory edukacyjne oraz rozrywkowe daje tej grze:

8,5/10

14079827.review: There are good ideas here.  it's too short and the puzzles are all easy, but I like that I'm seeing something new.  I kind would like to see sequel actually, that takes the idea and makes real game out of it.  I think there's a flash version demo that you can play on sites like kongregate.

14068450.review:
A simple to dismiss game, due to its bundle-game like feeling, it's surprisingly addictive in its simplicity. You wander through mansion rooms, looking for note sheet parts, completing music mosaics when you have gathered enough of the former and learn some history behind the music pieces. Plus, like myself, you might get to know names of some melodies, which you knew since childhood, but didn't know where they come from.
Play a room per day after work/uni/school, and it will provide just a bit of comfort and relaxation you may need.

14041747.review:
A simple puzzle game which doesn't last all that long but is decent entertainment.  You have to find parts of musical scores for songs in each room (so it's a bit like a hidden object game) and when you've found all the pieces, you have to arrange the bits of music into the template so that the song plays correctly (so it's a bit like a musical mosaic game).

It's not too difficult, and the hint system basically just tells you whether the pieces you've already placed are in the right place or not.

It's just £3.99 at full price, though I got it in a sale, and while it's comparatively short, it's well presented and the music is nice.

Give it a dabble.  :)

13603570.review: I bought this game and proceeded to play it for three hours before completing it.  I must say I throughly enjoyed my time spent playing it, and the only thing that stopped me from buying a copy for a friend was a lack of wallet funds.

13564995.review:
固定画面の中で譜面を探す。
ちょっとした組み合わせがある場合もあるが、マウスで怪しそうな物をクリックしていけば簡単に見つかる。
たまにわかりづらい物もあるが、根気よくマウスクリック！

出来た譜面はジグソーパズルのようにバラバラになっている。
主旋律だけのヒントを元にパズルを組み上げれば名曲が流れてクリア・・・の繰り返し。
パーツを置く位置の大まかなヒントもあるので、クリアするだけなら苦労することもないだろう。

有名な曲ばかりでタイトルを知らなくても耳にしたことがあるであろう物が多く、
クリア後の曲の演奏を聞くのが心地よい。

実績もカードもなく価格は安いのだが、クソゲーではない。
小粒だけど良い作品だった。

クリアするとこんな感じ↓

It has a little story, but in my opinion it ends too abruptly. It was not satisfactory for me. Maybe it's not really important, because the game is gameplay focused.. and the gameplay is funny ;-).
The game contains only classical songs, modernized, songs everyone knows ♫.

It's worth 5€/5$? I don't know, a nice game but too short.. btw, I bought it on sale.

12179764.review:
I love puzzle games, always have, however when you combine that love for puzzles AND a love for music in one game? God it's a match made in heaven.

Very very well designed game, such a beautiful ambience to it from room to room. I love the various instruments as well as portraits of some composers with really neat info about them. It's a point n' click, simple but the puzzles themselves are challanging. Even to someone with a good ear (they're all musically based).

It was all too short for me, but worth every moment :) highly recommend to any and everyone!

11460486.review:
Ein kleines, aber feines Puzzlespiel, das auch schnell zu erlernen ist. Die Kombination aus Musikstücken und Suchbild ist gelungen, die verschiedenen Arten der Musikbox-Puzzle tragen zum Spielspaß bei: Mal ist das Grundthema des Musikstücks vorgegeben, dann wieder fehlt es und man muss das Musikstück geometrisch zusammensetzen oder aus Ikonen aneinender fügen.
Insgesamt zu empfehlen, besonders wenn man mal einen kleinen Überblick über die (klassische) Musik haben möchte: An der schönen blauen Donau, In der Halle des Bergkönigs, Good morning to all und weitere.

Niente di particolarmente ostico o originale, ma nel complesso è un gioco utile per passare un paio di orette tranquille per variare un pò.

知育ソフト並にストイックな音楽パズル。

サンプルを聴けるのは主旋律のみで、
ブロックの形をヒントに伴奏を合わせてゆく。
ドラムなんかもうどこでもいいだろと思えるが、
正解に合致すると気持ち良さが段違い。

曲は有名なクラシックや民謡で、音質も良好。
フリーのFlash版があるが、違いは曲数の追加と、
何故かブロックの模様が気持ち悪くなっている。

10010982.review: Jeśli lubisz puzzle i układanki, bierz spokojnie. Super jakość wykonania, fajne melodie, fajny klimacik.  Jednak raczej tylko dla fanów gatunku, tzn. dla fanów puzzli i ukladanek wszelakich, przypomnijmy. Dla nich powinno to być coś około: 7/10.

9955048.review: O jogo de início parece simples e bobo... Mas te envolve de uma maneira que só da pra parar depois que zera o jogo. Muito bom! Creio que o jogo da muito certo pra quem tem um pouco conhecimento em música. Quem não tem ritmo ou pouco conhecimento em música creio que irá se bater um pouco mais para completar o jogo. Porém a diversão é garantida.

9823018.review:
동명의 안드로이드 게임을 먼저해보다가 인디갈라 번들을 통해 스팀으로도 하게 됐습니다. 음.. 숨은그림찾기 정도와 퍼즐이 혼합된, 그리고 귀에 익은 명곡들이 포함된 그런 꽤 신선한(?) 퍼즐게임입니다.ㅎ 곡이 주어지면 곡의 흐름에 맞게 악기들의 순서를 맞추는데요, 이때 사실 곡을 몰라도 풀 수 있긴 하지만 곡을 안다면 난이도가 확 낮아져요. 단, 한 소절에 같은 악기가 두번 나오지 않도록 주의하시기만 하면 됩니다. 

난이도는 평이하며 클리어할때까지 약 2~3시간 정도 소요되는 것 같네요. 도전과제가 있었더라면 하는 아쉬움이 좀 있구요, 제가 클래식을 좋아해서 약간의 가산점이 좀 있었습니다.ㅎㅎ

9617124.review:
Puzzles bem elaborados e sonorização muito boa. É um jogo bem curto e fácil.

9/10

9599685.review: Easy and short puzzle game, but fun.

9397117.review:
パズルのピースごとに演奏の一部分が割り振られており、そのピースをきちんとした曲になるように且つ型にはまるようにするゲーム
ひとつずつ耳を澄ませて選んでいき全てはまった時の喜びははひとしおだ
どの曲もどっかで聞き覚えのある曲ばかりでやっていて非常に面白かった
難点はポイントクリックモードでステージを見つけてからパズルモードに入るのだが、
このポイントクリックモードは正直蛇足だった気がするところ

9387382.review:
Потрясающе красивая игра! Помогает развить "чувство прекрасного". Если вы не знакомы с великими музыкальными творениями эта игра поможет вам услышать их, а так же самому поучаствовать в их компоновке. Геймплей построен на типичных играх найди педмет на экране, так что игравшим в что-то подобное, пройти её не составит труда. Ставлю ей 7 из 10. 
P.S В игре не реализована русская локализация, но думаю для тех кто знает английский это не будет большой проблемой.

Musiac is a very nice game with 2 different types of Gameplay.

Number 1 - you search for "parts" In a 2d room and sometimes you must complete small puzzles to get those parts.

Number 2 - You must complete various kind of Puzzles where you have to recreate songs.

The Gameplay is simple, easy and  -  fun!

During the few hours i played and completed the game i had alot of fun. And, thats what a game is supposed t be.

I can only recommend you to buy this game if you want a small  but nice puzzle game.

8900485.review:
パズル性の強い音ゲーム。
加えて脱出ゲームのようなモノ探し要素も有り。
まずは楽譜探しから始まり、揃ったら音ゲーパズルステージに入る。
パズルステージではクラシックミュージックの、バイオリン・チェロ等の各パートを聞き分けて曲を完成させればクリア。
どこかで聞いたあの曲ばかりなので、クリア後はしばらく耳に残る。
自分は音楽センスが無いのか結構時間かかりました。
特に後半は結構な難易度なのでやりごたえあるかも。
元々人気のフラッシュゲームを製品化したものなので、同名で検索すればフリー版が見つかるはず。
製品版は数曲追加された程度なので、買うのであれば1ドル程度になったときを狙うといいかも。

8202494.review:
Прекрасная головоломка, которая поможет убить... не больше часу свободного времени. К сожалению, она очень короткая, а поскольку загадки чрезвычайно просты, проходится она очень быстро. Если честно, полноценный релиз напоминает, скорее, демоверсию игры, в которой должно быть еще 10 комнат и еще как минимум 100 музыкальных головоломок. Но увы. 

Сама идея очень интересная. Чуть больше бы хардкору. Более менее сложных загадок всего две - финальная и там, где трек мелодии  поделен на части. Остальное решается как-то уж слишком легко ) В этом смысле поиск элементов головоломки в комнатах даже интереснее выглядит.

Еще ОЧЕНЬ смутил стимовский релиз. Росиийский разработчик, а поддержки русского языка в Steam-версии нет. Как так то?

Уверен, что разработчики еще выпустят Musaic Box 2. Хотелось бы больше уровней, серьезнее загадок и языковой поддержки соотечественников :)

А за игру спасибо! Удалась в любом случае.

8001517.review:
6.5/10

A short, but sweet experience that doesn't need a heavy investment in time.  Musaic Box is a puzzle game at heart with a very basic story to it.  Find outlines hidden about your grandfather's workshop.  Doing so succesfully will allow you to uncover your birthday present.  Once you complete an outline you'll be able to piece together a musical melody that starts in pieces and needs to be assembled to complete the final work.  As a layman,  I found the music enjoyable and sometime's nostalgic.  The difficultiy varies with a few pieces being somewhat hard to solve.  Luckily there's a hint option that makes the process a bit easier by shading out misplaced pieces.  Even though I favor this game it could have been much more than it is.  There are only five rooms to explore and about a dozen or so melodies to solve.  There is a Creation option at the end of the game, but it only allows your to rearrange previously solved melodies.  I wish they would have gone into depth explaining the history behind each piece and possibly extending the experience with other areas to explore.  Personally, I wouldn't pay full price for this game, but that's just me.  Wait for it too show up in a bundle or a sale and you won't regret the few dollars you spend on it.  Kid friendly, but your child may struggle with no prior knowlodge of the music in the game.  I played in Big Picture Mode and had a problem with scaling.  The screen was stretched off screen on all sides.  If you encounter the same problem keep in mind that 3-4 of the outlines or solutions to outlines are hidden a bit off screen.  That's what gave me the most trouble.

1321604.review: A sufficiently flawed music/puzzle game.  The concept of the game isn't necessarily weak, but the execution by KranX is where this game falters.  Primarily, a small but noticable portion of the puzzles have odd (dis)harmonies that leave you scratching your heads at whether the people making the puzzles had even heard the original songs before.   As a whole though, the good outweighs the bad and it's an enjoyable enough game for music/puzzle game fans.  However, I probably wouldn't pay full price for this, even at a price as low as $5.

5382472.review: I thought this was a fun game, even though it's fairly short; I finished it in ~2 hours.  The goal is to solve a series of musical puzzles, but to do so you have to find pieces first.  That first part seems like a standard "find the hidden object" kind of game to me (and it will give hints automatically over time, so you shouldn't get too stuck), so it's the second part that's interesting.  In the musical puzzles, you have to arrange a series of blocks in a grid so that the grid is completely filled and the blocks allow the given piece of music to be played properly (in the correct order).  Most puzzles offer some guidance by providing the main melody for you to listen to, and there's a hint system you can use if needed that will tell you which blocks are incorrectly placed in a full grid.  It may be a little hard to explain in words, but I think it's easy enough to learn and fun to play, so if you like these sorts of games, this one is worth a try.

総ゲーム時間もそこまで長くはないので

74333.review: This is a very simple music based puzzle game with an eye spy front end. The mechanics are done well, but the game lacks any significant puzzle complexity. The musical pieces include familiar classical tunes...Old MacDonald, Twinkle Twinkle Little Star, Auld Lang Syne, etc...pretty boring stuff. Keep your expectations low and you won't be disappointed spending five quarters on it, but you can play this on the web as a free java game all the same.

811234.review:
What a great game, I didn't really know what to expect, especially for a price this low. I expected some sort of old school point and click adventure, but got a nice music/rhythm puzzle game instead, with point and click elements. The goal is to search rooms for parts of music sheets and combine these together to create a full sheet. You then have to recreate the music by forming a puzzle. You do this with several blocks, each with their own instrument(s). The example is listed in the lower center so you continually have to listen to the example and try and fit the puzzle together. It starts off easy but gets more difficult in a matter of minutes. It's a nice challenge, and I enjoyed it very much, because I'm an avid music listener. It's, so far, all classical music though, but most of them are well known.
Even though the music fits the style, it would've been nice if there was a game around (sequel maybe, someday ?) with more modern music or where you could load your own music.

[Rating: 77/100]

1643977.review: Short at 2 hours long, but compelling. I finished it in one sitting (well I would have if I didn't have to go to sleep), and there is a sure sense of gratification with successfully putting together each musical piece. The 'searching' sections are mostly trial and error, and some parts are way too easy, but it's a nice relaxing little puzzle game with, of course, some great music. It's probably not worth $5, though, so maybe wait until this one's on sale.

1284530.review: Musaic is a musical puzzle game. It's all about clasical or traditional music that was made throughout the ages. It also has a bit of a hidden objects game too. I surely suggest it for whoever likes music and puzzles!

1985597.review:
Musaic Box is half hidden object game, half music puzzler. Finding enough objects takes you to a puzzle screen where you arrange blocks of different shapes that have parts of the melody, harmony, or rhythm on them, so that they form the whole song when played beginning to end. This game only uses classical, public domain songs, but the tracks are definitely pleasant to listen to if you can enjoy orchestral music (with a few exceptions, most of which are at the start).

The puzzle quality is decent. Most puzzles aren't hard. Some are a little tricky, but the hard ones are only tough because the harmony sections will repeat a few times and you won't have enough info to know which is which. That said, there's a hint button that will reveal misplaced blocks, which makes that a bit easier.

I finished it 100% in 2.5 hours. It's a short game that was worth the time and money I spent on it. I spent $1.25; don't pay much more than that.

1428425.review: I personally loved this game; the light adventure-style gameplay coupled with some amusing puzzles as a vehicle for a nostalgic trek through a handful of classical music pieces reminiscent of some happy memories made for a very pleasant experience.
